description:
Master-class training showing how to use onOne's Perfect Effects 9

This comprehensive video training course demonstrates all of the features inside of onOne's Perfect Effects 9. Nicole shares her knowledge of the suite, how to use each filter, what all of the tools do, how to work with and manage presets, and more! Then, in the last chapter, she demonstrates how to tie all of these skills together by showing the start-to-finish processing entirely in Perfect Effects 9.

Whether you are brand-new to Perfect Effects, or have been using it for some time, you are guaranteed to learn even more about onOne's most popular processing software.

After completing this course, you will have the following skills:

  • Gain a deeper understanding of the software
  • Learn how and why certain adjustments are used
  • Discover new ways to process your photos with onOne's Perfect Effects
  • Edit your images with confidence
title: The Complete Guide to onOne's Perfect Effects
